attributes.additional_details:
We want the Department of Education to re-visit the proposal to build a new merged school on the site of Collegiate School, Highfurlong,Blackpool, but instead choose Bispham High School as the preferred site because the loss of the school to Greenlands Ward will decimate the area,to both community and businesses alike.
Bispham High School is not just a school but an important part of our community.
